item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif"</a>> Just to wish you a very happy Easter and hope the trip is going well. Have done the Church flowers and it's beef Wellington for Easter Day lunch tomorrow.</p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif“> Just to wish you a very happy Easter and hope the trip is going well. Have done the Church flowers and it’s beef Wellington for Easter Day lunch tomorrow.
